articles.author: Jack Aylmer, Jack Aylmer, Evan Hummel, Jake Maslo
articles.title: Giant asteroid will fly by Earth in 2029, scientists want to catch it - Straight Arrow News
articles.description: The European Space Agency is working on a plan to catch an asteroid on track to closely pass by Earth in 2029.
articles.content:
[JACK AYLMER]
STOP ME IF YOU’VE HEARD THIS ONE BEFORE – AN ASTEROID IS BARRELLING TOWARDS EARTH AND IT’S UP TO A SPACE AGENCY TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT. 
WHILE IT MIGHT SOUND LIKE THE PLOT OF ARMAGE… [+1484 chars]
